item.description: User profile management endpoints with automatic authentication

request.description: Get list of all provinces in Vietnam
Get districts within a specific province
Get wards within a specific district
Create a new building (requires landlord role)
Get my buildings with pagination (requires authentication)
Get detailed information about a building
Update building information (owner only)
Get list of buildings owned by current user with pagination
Delete a building (cannot delete if there are active rentals)

item.name: ğŸ  Rooms Management

request.description: Get my rooms with pagination (requires authentication)
Create room type with automatic room instance generation
Get detailed room type information with pricing, amenities, costs, rules
Get room details using slug (public endpoint for search)
Update room type - amenities/costs/rules arrays will COMPLETELY OVERRIDE existing data
Get list of room types in a building with pagination
